Title: Sword of Destiny
Plot: Gob and Buster team up for some magic tricks with the help of Buster's fake hand, but when Tony Wonder, a rival magician, starts to mentor them, somebody gets the finger. Meanwhile, Michael is forced to delegate some work when he's hospitalized and Lindsay teaches George Michael how to drive using the staircar.
GuestStars: Craig Anstett, Ben Hoffman, Bob Glouberman, David McMillan, George Cheung, Kevin Heffernan, Paul Feig, Ian Roberts, Dan Castellaneta, Ben Stiller
